author: Simon Difford
description: Anything from 10ml (1/3oz) to 15ml (1/2oz) maple syrup works in this recipe, depending on your maple syrup, lemons and personal taste. I've gone for the middle of the road at 12.5ml as for me the trio combines wonderfully with the maple syrup still in something of a supporting role.
name: Maple Leaf

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
